website_summaries.verdict: These soft gels contain Svetol coffee bean extract, with no fillers or artificial ingredients, and chlorogenic acids that are believed to aid weight loss.
pros: Decaffeinated to prevent the jitters while curbing your appetite
Coconut oil to benefit cholesterol levels
Svetol is one of the few products on the market that has been scientifically studied
cons: Large pills can be difficult for some to swallow

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. I can tell a difference, just started my second bottle... hoping for more results. Update 12/21/2018: Since beginning this supplement in combination with CLA-1250, I have lost a solid 14 lbs. since September. Though I lost all my pregnancy weight, the belly fat continued to linger... with these supplements and moderate excercise, it's finally beginning to firm up and flatten out!
customer_reviews.author: JillHdz

customer_reviews.title: This is the only Green Coffee Bean Extract that works ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the only Green Coffee Bean Extract that works for me. I have tried a couple of others, and the Sports Research brand with Svetol is the only one that noticeably curbs my appetite. When taken a half hour before a meal as instructed,I find myself feeling full faster and thus eating less. It has been helpful to me in maintaining my weight, not just losing weight, although it certainly made that easier. No side effects at all.
customer_reviews.author: Carol C.

customer_reviews.title: It is good!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is good!!!! I have noticed that it does what it advertises. I didn't really notice much of the difference for metabolism at first. Then again I have a high metabolism to begin with. I have noticed that my weight seems to be more regulated than before. This is not changing my diet at all, and I have the worst eating habits ever. Straight junk lol
customer_reviews.author: Ghosty

customer_reviews.title: Green Coffee Bean
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for over a month and I think they have helped provide me with more energy and has been helping me with my health and fitness journey. I have not lost a significant amount of weight, but I also have not gained any since taking them either. I take this in conjunction with their other supplements and I am pleased. I like how the supplements contain natural ingredients and not gelatin and other fillers.
customer_reviews.author: Arielle

customer_reviews.title: Powerful addition to my nutrition and exercise plan
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product in combination with SRC's Garcinia Cambogia for 2 weeks now and have lost a total of 6 pounds in combination with heavily increased amount of veggies in my diet, 160 minutes per week on bicycle, and average (without the exercise) of 12000 steps. I was averaging about .5 to 1 pound a week prior with the Garcinia Cambogia alone. I will however mention the GC supplement causes a huge mental boost, increasing resilience to stress and giving me positive energy to be more active without the effects of caffeine and other jittery causes supplements. I highly recommend the combination in addition to a healthy food intake and exercise regimen.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mabb

customer_reviews.title: Beyond HUGE capsules!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s probably a good product but I’ve nearly choked to death each time I’ve tried to take one in fact my husband had to do the Heimlich maneuver to me the other day because of these. (And I can typically handle large capsules) i might try cutting them open and squeezing the contents into a smoothie
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: SR Sport
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Have used this for a couple of years and always come back to this brand.
customer_reviews.author: d

customer_reviews.title: Return customer, loved it first time
customer_reviews.text: I used this product a couple of years ago and loved it. I just started my new bottle this time around and thus far feel great with it. I am sensitive to caffeine or stimulants and this supplement doesn't make me feel jittery or edgy like other products I have tried. Four stars because I am starting new bottle but if it works as it did in the past I will be a return customer AGAIN
customer_reviews.author: CE

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product & fantastic company
customer_reviews.text: I would like to say that I am amazed by the customer service and promptness of receiving my order from sports research. This product is amazing and has so far curbed My appetite and I feel wonderful each day that I take it. There are a lot products that claim to be the same thing as this product but they are not. This product is top-of-the-line the companies top-of-the-line and I am honestly truly satisfied for the first time in a long time buying one of these products. Please keep up the good work.
customer_reviews.author: Steven A. Mottor

customer_reviews.title: Super product!! It actually works!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the products by Sports Research!! I take 1 Green Coffee softgel 3x per day with the CLA 250 by Sports Research. I noticed weight lose by the first week. I am 45 yrs old- the products by SR are phenomenal- they actually work AND I love that they are all Vegan & NON-GMO!!
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes Maria Cascio

customer_reviews.title: No noticable difference.
customer_reviews.text: I really didn't find any noticeable difference using this product. It was worth a try and wasn't too expensive. There is no substitute for eating healthy and exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking this product for a few months now and been losing about 2 pounds a week.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Collier

customer_reviews.title: Product is not as described
customer_reviews.text: The formula has changed. These were once 400mg per softgel. The package I received this time says 200mg per softgel on the back label. This is false advertising it still says 400mg on the front. I will not purchase this again for the price. I buy other products made by this company but I think I'm done now because of the misleading information provided on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Still taking product to see its effect. Product came ...
customer_reviews.text: Still taking product to see its effect. Product came quickly. It is taken in combination with Gardenia Cambodia - wish they had to same amount to finish seeing if results are successful. Pills are big and both are same color so don't mix and/or forget which is which.
customer_reviews.author: Hello

customer_reviews.title: By far the BEST Green Coffee!
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the BEST Green Coffee pills I have taken! I absolutely love this product, I no longer have to diet, I take the pills as directed and my weight loss has been steady and WONDERFUL! I don't deprive my self of anything ( I DO NOT OVER EAT, EITHER), I don't count calories, or "points" anymore and there have been NO NEGATIVE side effects. I just live my life and enjoy every minute of it 33lbs lighter! :) Thank You!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: 20 year old and I'm cuttin'
customer_reviews.text: Like all supplements, each person has different results and opinions, just keep that in mind! These pills are really great when it comes to stopping cravings and boosting metabolism. My goal in the gym and with what I eat has been to keep my muscle but burn fat and these pills have been helping me along the way. Just follow the instructions which are to take 1 with 8oz (or more) water 30 minutes prior to your three daily meals. Results are coming in and I don't feel jittery or sluggish when taking these pills as I did with other supplements. These coffee beans (and protein) are the only supplements that are entering my body and I'm lovin it.
customer_reviews.author: Carlo

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product as well as their others
customer_reviews.text: I added this to their CLA and Garcinia. It really boosted my weight loss! I hula hoop for a half hour everyday and the weight has been falling off! And in a healthy time frame. Since April I have lost 16 lbs.! I highly recommend this product as well as their others!
customer_reviews.author: Shay R

customer_reviews.title: I've given it 5 stars....because it WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: This product works!!! I am a huge snacker and struggle with a sweet tooth....I've noticed a big difference in my cravings. With making better choices in my diet and exercising 30 min a day...I'm seeing results!! I'm impressed with this product and will definitely keep using until I reach my goal. I've given it 5 stars because it works!
customer_reviews.author: Becky N

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me
customer_reviews.text: This product really did help me get the weight off. I had been working out and had changed my eating habits for more than 4 months and was stuck at the same weight. After 5 weeks of Green Coffee I lost an additional 7 pounds with no further changes to my routine. I am also very sensitive to caffeine and can't drink coffee, sodas etc. and these pills did not cause any adverse effects such as upset stomach or insomnia. I couldn't be happier with the results!
customer_reviews.author: Farya

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: Just started taking this for a week so far but just 2 a day rather than the 3 it suggests taking. I haven't had any side effects (no jitters, headaches, stomach issues) and my stomach looks a little more toned. I'll see how the rest of the month goes with these supplements.
customer_reviews.author: Rac

customer_reviews.title: One of the best GCB extracts
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for about three weeks now. Even though my scales don't show a weight loss yet, I've noticed my clothing fits better. I've also received compliments of "you look good, have you lost weight?" from several friends I don't see that often. The capsule is large but easy to swallow; some GCB products in other brands do not go down as easily. It doesn't upset me stomach in any way and I will happily order this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I used it every morning before my breakfast and have been working perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Arianna

customer_reviews.title: Loving it......
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It gives you energy, easy to swallow and no jitters. Customer Service for this product is excellent. Orders are expedited quiclky and you will get follow-up emails to make sure you are satisfied as well as inquiries of your progress.

customer_reviews.title: Used for long time for blood pressure
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I take it for controlling blood pressure. Can’t get at Amazon anymore

customer_reviews.title: Energizing and Effective
customer_reviews.text: I found the SVETOL Green Coffee Bean Extract Soft-gels to be quite effective because i did see a significant reduction in abdominal fat after a month's use. The pill is easy to swallow, did not give me any side effects and even gave me some extra energy (although it being caffeine free). The taste is not pungent like most vitamin/supplement pills are which made it easier to take. Although i did not change my lifestyle while taking this supplement, i feel that if i did i would have lost more overall body fat.
customer_reviews.author: MNG

customer_reviews.title: I've been using this product for 30 days- With it ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for 30 days- With it I have only maintained my current weight, but to be fair, I wasn't making any effort whatsoever in my diet or exercise. I am ordering it again, and will this time make an effort to eat a bit healthier and also get in some gym time. Since it did help me to not gain, I believe that with some effort, I will actually be able to shed some pounds! I have not had any side effects whatsoever from this product, which is why I had no hesitation in ordering it again, and this time working with it!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley M Rozzi

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff:)
customer_reviews.text: I have been using SRC products for a long time. The green coffee bean is the newest addition and I can tell that I notice a difference. I feel more energetic and not as hungry. I also noticed that my workouts are better.

customer_reviews.title: Great product to increase energy without any side effects!

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed taking the Green Coffee pills. I did expect a slightly more energized feel, but definitely felt refreshing. Would recommend it!

Both of my children are under the age of 2 years old so time to myself to work out and boost my metabolism seems so far away.I tried this hoping for a little extra help.I have been taking it for 3 weeks now and have lost twice as much weight each week that I had the preceding weeks.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!

I really did research and chose this because it has the svetol and gives you a full month. You feel the difference in just a few days. The cravings for sugar go away. The people are so nice and they are so prompt in sending it out. I have love the experience I've had with the product and the people....and I've lost about 10 pounds already.

customer_reviews.title: Bait and switch
customer_reviews.text: I feel a bit ripped off. The product specification clearly points out this is the only supplement that offers 400mg yet the bottle I received clearly only has 200mg..... I should have paid half the cost that I did.

customer_reviews.title: so far so good

customer_reviews.title: Quality product that works

And, their labels show exactly what's inside with great explanations of every ingredient. I especially like what's NOT in their products - just look at a label and you'll be happy with what you are NOT consuming. I purchase and use other Sports Research products and I will continue to add more of their product line in the future.

You feel pretty disgusted with yourself (or even more normal) after eating a large portion meal.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good at controlling appetite
customer_reviews.text: I believe that any weight loss, muscle building plan must include exercise and a good diet. There is no magic bullet. But there are things that help give you a boost towards losing weight. I've used green coffee supplements for about a year. I've used these for about a month and so far so good. A couple of pounds lost. I like the added coconut oil which I believe gives this product an edge over others. Coconut oil helps with fat burning. There's no reason not give 5 stars since this brand gives the highest concentrates and if you do it right and not overeat, expecting this to even out the calorie intake, you're going to have good results.

Any weight loss abilities , i will reserve my opinion until 6 months have passed.

My only complaint is that the pills are really big, like huge. a few times I felt like they were stuck in my throat the entire day. But other than that I'm pretty impressed. I can go back to the gym in another 2 weeks and will update if I feel like this has helped further my weight loss. But as of now I would say with no diet or exercise its doing the job. Good luck to my fellow seekers of better health and healthier weights

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good

customer_reviews.author: Davemac

customer_reviews.title: While there are many Green Coffee Bean Extracts on the ...
customer_reviews.text: While there are many Green Coffee Bean Extracts on the market, I know Sports Research has created a product that is legitimate, pure, and safe. Compared to other brands, this coffee bean extract is well priced and works wonders.
customer_reviews.author: Charles H.

customer_reviews.title: Probably not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I thought I'd give this product a try to see if it really does anything to lean you out or drop body fat percentage. I already exercised daily and kept a steady diet prior to starting this product so my weight has been constant for months. I added the coffee extract into the routine as the only change in order to do a fair test without changing anything else. After about two months there was no significant decrease in weight or average blood pressure. There maybe was some blunting of hunger so that may be helpful for some people. I don't feel it was worth the money spent in my case.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mello

I will try another bottle after this one is completed.

customer_reviews.title: I much as I hate to admit it
customer_reviews.text: Sadly enough...I took my first dose around 3:30pm. A few hours later I started itching. I thought okay maybe my skin is dry (recovering from surgery and going through therapy so I cannot reach my back that well). I took an oil bath, took another dose about an 1 hour ago and the itching has increased. I much as I hate to admit it ... I know am having an allergic reaction to this. I have taken GCBE before (by another manufacturer) and never had a reaction. I will need to take something to counteract the reaction so I can stop itching. I do need the GCBE (because it really works) but I cannot use this product by this manufacturer.
